shortDescription: Just-in-time application access with PIM for Groups
title: Just-in-time application access with PIM for Groups
description: Provide just-in-time access to non-Microsoft applications such as AWS & GCP. This capability integrates PIM for groups and application provisioning to reduce the activation time from 40+ minutes to roughly 2 minutes when requesting just-in-time access to a role in a non-Microsoft app.
